Text: Would not play.  Would not convert.

Downloaded it again.  Neither VLC nor WMP would play it.  Tried to convert it and no software I have will even read it.  So I downloaded four new pieces of software, most of which refused to play it.  Finally, I got a new video player software which showed the video files UPSIDE DOWN.  On top of all this Quicktime simply refuses to install!

played on wmp 12 with only divx codec added, Converted with xilisoft video converter into divx file, files joined with divx author, converted again with divx converter 7 to reduce file size and play on my archos player, found no loss of quality ...slow but worth it
